common_2020_kusa_020_kusa_02:
It catches the winds that blow across Paldea and,
slowly yet powerfully, spins ever on.[npcn:17]
common_2020_kusa_020_kusa_03:
My leaping down from that windmill to appear
before those who would challenge my Gym\r
lends an added depth to our battles![npcn:17]
common_2020_kusa_020_kusa_04:
I knew you would understand my reasoning,
[trnm:0]! Hahahaha![npcn:17]
common_2020_kusa_020_kusa_05:
Though I believe I can spare my legs today, as we
are sure to create my greatest masterpiece yet—\r
even if I do not alight from above![npcn:17]
common_2020_kusa_020_kusa_06:
But I digress. We are both artists, are we not?
We have no further use for words now.[npcn:17]
common_2020_kusa_020_kusa_07:
I assume you are ready? Let our collaborative
work of art begin![npcn:17]
common_2020_kusa_020_kusa_08:
Seeing you in the midst of battle—you are like a
unique gradient, subtly changing hues![npcn:17]
common_2020_kusa_020_kusa_09:
Riotous and yet gentle! Such contrast... I lack the
words to express it. My hat goes off to you![npcn:17]
common_2020_kusa_020_kusa_10:
My battles with you are truly a gift. Each time, I
am made to remember how I felt so long ago\r
when I first ventured into this world of art.[npcn:17]
common_2020_kusa_020_kusa_11:
Ah, I almost forgot. You were here for the Gym
inspection in the Top Champion’s stead, correct?[npcn:17]
common_2020_kusa_020_kusa_12:
Well, that is of no consequence. Report on my
Gym here as you see fit.[npcn:17]
common_2020_kusa_020_kusa_13:
Ah! My inspiration is overflowing, as if drawn
from a bottomless well![npcn:17]
common_2020_kusa_020_kusa_14:
I will begin on a new piece at once! You must
excuse me. Farewell![npcn:17]
